reviewText: Love the pond and the characters
Very funny. Our 3 year old son loves this show.  I like the fact that it teaches him Christian values.
Appreciate the wholesome message of the stories. The animation is good, not great. My son loves watching it over and over.

My 3 year old loves The Pond dvd's. I'm trying to locate all of them for her because of the great message and easy to remember character building traits. Fun music with catchy words and cute characters.
